Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.AdditionalHeaderInfoHandler
    Deprecated and replaced by an extension point mechanism based on HeaderPropertyHandler.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.AdditionalHeaderInfo
    Deprecated and replaced by an extension point mechanism based on HeaderPropertyHandler. Helper methods as found in AdditionalHeaderInfo are now available in a slightly different form in HeaderPropertyUtils.
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.AdditionalHeaderInfoRenderer
    Deprecated and replaced by RDKit Types Plugin class org.rdkit.knime.headers.AdditionalHeaderInfoRenderer.
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.fingerprintreadwrite.FingerprintReaderNodeDialog
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.fingerprintreadwrite.FingerprintReaderNodeFactory
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.fingerprintreadwrite.FingerprintReaderNodeModel
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.fingerprintreadwrite.FingerprintWriterNodeDialog
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.fingerprintreadwrite.FingerprintWriterNodeFactory
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.fingerprintreadwrite.FingerprintWriterNodeModel
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.fingerprintreadwrite.FPSReadWriteUtil
    org.rdkit.knime.util.HorizontalCompoundIcon
    Deprecated and replaced by RDKit Types Plugin class org.rdkit.knime.headers.HorizontalCompoundIcon.
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.multiplesubstrucfilter.RDKitDictSubstructFilterNodeDialog 
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.multiplesubstrucfilter.RDKitDictSubstructFilterNodeFactory
    The functionality of this class has been combined with the RDKit Molecule Structure Filter Node.
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.multiplesubstrucfilter.RDKitDictSubstructFilterNodeModel
    The functionality of this class has been combined with the RDKit Molecule Structure Filter Node.
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.highlightingatoms.RDKitHighlightingAtomsNodeDialog
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.highlightingatoms.RDKitHighlightingAtomsNodeFactory
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.highlightingatoms.RDKitHighlightingAtomsNodeModel
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.onecomponentreaction.RDKitOneComponentReactionNodeDialogPane
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.onecomponentreaction.RDKitOneComponentReactionNodeFactory
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.onecomponentreaction.RDKitOneComponentReactionNodeModel
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.twocomponentreaction.RDKitTwoComponentReactionNodeDialogPane
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.twocomponentreaction.RDKitTwoComponentReactionNodeFactory
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.twocomponentreaction.RDKitTwoComponentReactionNodeModel
    org.rdkit.knime.util.VerticalCompoundIcon
    Deprecated and replaced by RDKit Types Plugin class org.rdkit.knime.headers.VerticalCompoundIcon.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.rdkit.knime.util.StringUtils.buildStringFromArray(Object[])
    Use the method Arrays.toString(Object[]) instead.
    org.rdkit.knime.util.StringUtils.buildStringFromList(List<Object>)
    Use the method List#toString() instead.
    org.rdkit.knime.nodes.AbstractRDKitNodeModel.ParallelProcessor.createColumnRearranger(DataTableSpec, AbstractRDKitCellFactory[], BlockingQueue<DataCell[]>, ExecutionContext)
    This method is not used anymore and will be removed in the future.
    org.rdkit.knime.types.RDKitReactionCell.getCellSerializer()
    As of KNIME 3.0 data types are registered via extension point. This method is not used anymore. The serializer is made known in the extension point configuration.
    org.rdkit.knime.types.RDKitMolCell2.getCellSerializer()
    As of KNIME 3.0 data types are registered via extension point. This method is not used anymore. The serializer is made known in the extension point configuration.
    org.rdkit.knime.types.RDKitAdapterCell.getCellSerializer()
    As of KNIME 3.0 data types are registered via extension point. This method is not used anymore. The serializer is made known in the extension point configuration.
    org.rdkit.knime.util.StringUtils.replace(String, String, String)
    Use String.replace(CharSequence, CharSequence) instead. Only the null handling is different and needs to be checked manually before using the string instance.
